name: Light Of Shadow
description:
In this game you will need to survive in a mysterious underworld world doomed by an ancient darkness creature. This creature still alive and is your only chance to fight versus the other survivors that will fight for the remaining light.

This darkness creature is virtually immortal and only have a weakness the light, if you stay in the light it will not attack you. But light will not last forever in the deeps.

Advance for a lot of places in this underworld, meet lot of creatures that can be hostile or not, uses the ancient mechanism of the lost civilization to could survive in this world and find your exit and your lost friend.
